# Quilt Loading Screen

![Licensed under MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-informational) ![GitHub Workflow Status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/wafflecoffee/quilt-loading-screen/build)

[![download quilt-loading-screen on modrinth](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/quilt-loading-screen?color=5da545&label=modrinth&suffix=%20downloads&style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/quilt-loading-screen) (clickable)

Makes the Minecraft loading screen look like the banner of the QuiltMC Community Server.

![Screenshot of Loading Screen](https://i.imgur.com/o6sme20.png)

Includes the Quilt UI resource pack (disabled by default) by [Oliver-makes-code](https://github.com/Oliver-makes-code), big thanks to them for giving their blessing!
